desc: Kaizen Lowcarb High Protein Pasta has 20 grams of protein, only 6 net carbs, and 130 calories per 2 oz serving! Its 100% plant based, grain free, low glycemic, keto, soy free, and made with high quality ingredients like lupin beans and fava bean protein. 80% fewer carbs compared to traditional pasta and 3x the protein!

layout.text: Woohoo! the NEW kaizen pasta is here.
